# Harmonizome

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Harmonizome is to provide a fast interface to download and perform functional and gene set enrichment analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Harmonizome from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("marceelrf/Harmonizome")
```
